children.value: Send Events to a third-party tool

Events are bundles of information Zaraz sends to a third-party tool when a particular trigger is matched. To start using them, first create a trigger that determines the condition for which the event is sent. If you have already
, follow these steps to create an event.
, and select your account and website.
, select the third-party tool you want to send an Event to — for example, Facebook Pixel or Google Analytics.
, you can find a list of events currently sent to the tool you chose. Clicking the links in each Event shows you more details about the conditions associated with it. To add a new Event, click
Give the event a descriptive name. Depending on the tool, you may need to configure additional settings.
field, choose the relevant trigger you
. You may choose more than one trigger for your Event. If you choose more than one trigger, the event will be sent to the third-party tool only when all the selected triggers are matched.
Depending on the tool, you may also choose an
. The options you can fill out in
will depend on the tool you are configuring.
